import random

class Sales:
    def __init__(self, base_price, demand):
        self.base_price = base_price
        self.demand = demand

    def compute_price(self, discount):
        if self.demand > 100:
            price = self.base_price * (1 - discount)
        else:
            price = self.base_price
        return price

    def simulate_sale_day(self, discount):
        price = self.compute_price(discount)
        sales_volume = self.demand - (price - self.base_price) * 10
        return sales_volume

# Variables
base_price = 100
demand = random.randint(50, 150)

# Creating Sales object
sale = Sales(base_price, demand)
discount = 0.1
final_sales_volume = sale.simulate_sale_day(discount)
print("Final Sales Volume:", final_sales_volume)
